meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one thousand cycles per second.
meanings.sent1: The radio station broadcasts at one thousand kilocycles.
meanings.sent2: The technician adjusted the equipment to receive signals in the kilocycles range.
meanings.sent3: I tried to count the kilocycles of the buzzing sound, but I lost track!
meanings.sent4: The kilocycles of laughter filled the room, echoing off the walls.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic kilocycles of the drumbeat set the pace for the dancers.

meanings.definition: A measurement of frequency in the kilohertz range.
meanings.sent1: The device measures the signal strength in kilocycles per second.
meanings.sent2: The kilocycles on the display showed a stable frequency.
meanings.sent3: The cat's purring sounded like tiny kilocycles of contentment.
meanings.sent4: The chirping birds created a symphony of kilocycles in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The steady hum of the engine was a comforting background of kilocycles.
